r.d: This package provides an objective wrapper for OpenSSL Crypto Library
r.n: * Fixed compilation with OpenSSL 1.1 and PHP 7.1 * Added KDF abstract class to be a parent for all key derivation function classes * Added PBKDF2 class extending KDF class and implementing PBKDF2 * Renamed HashException code ALGORITHM_NOT_FOUND to HASH_ALGORITHM_NOT_FOUND * Renamed MACException code ALGORITHM_NOT_FOUND to MAC_ALGORITHM_NOT_FOUND
